infotexts.entitydescription.trenchingtool: A simple tool used to erect fortifications or dig trenchs.
infotexts.entitydescription.medkit: A small metal container designed to carry medical supplies.
infotexts.entitydescription.medbag: A medical kit that carries large medical items. Can be wore as a bag.
infotexts.entitydescription.coalitionhelmet: Standard issue steel helmet. Protective against artillery shells, but not fire-arms.
infotexts.entitydescription.coalitionmedhelmet: Same as a normal helmet, but red with a white cross for medic identification. (WARNING: Wearing this helmet while being a active combatant is a war crime.)
infotexts.entitydescription.renegadehelmet: A flat rim helmet with netting over the top. Protective against artillery shells, but not gun-fire.
infotexts.entitydescription.renegademedhelmet: Similar to a standard helmet, but red with a white cross for medic identification. (WARNING: Wearing this helmet while being a active combatant is a war crime.)
infotexts.entitydescription.coalitiongear: Standard issue equipment for Coalition soldiers. Has pockets to hold anything from meds to ammo.
infotexts.entitydescription.coalitionmedgear: Standard issue rig for Coalition physicians. Has surgical gear that makes medical procedures more effective.
infotexts.entitydescription.renegadegear: Renegade's gear: a waist belt with pockets, tied together with a camo colored bandolier.
infotexts.entitydescription.renegademedgear: Renegade medic's gear: two large side packs on a waist belt, and a medical bandolier filled with surgical equipment.
